text:
💉 How can we ensure that a #COVID19 vaccine is accessible for everyone? And once accessible, does the general public have enough trust in the #vaccine to take it?

The @UN's @MelissaFleming explores how we can best respond on the OECD #podcast 🎙️👉 https://t.co/uRmAVSLtzC https://t.co/bxV1DenL4z
